name: Counter

descriptions.en_US: A simple counter that increases on press and can be configured to either decrease or reset on a long press. You can also configure the counter to store the current value in a txt file to use in other apps like OBS.

description: A simple counter that increases on press and can be configured to either decrease or reset on a long press. You can also configure the counter to store the current value in a txt file to use in other apps like OBS.
